Flub.Name: Output
Flub.Description: The type of output to create.

Flub.Name: Height
Flub.Description: Create a flat terrain of the specified height.

Flub.Name: Color
Flub.Description: Create a flat color output of the specified color.

Flub.Name: Noise
Flub.Description: Create a flat terrain with the specified noise.

Flub.Name: Height
Flub.Description: The height of the blank terrain.

Flub.Name: Color
Flub.Description: The color to use for creating a flat, color output.

Flub.Name: Iterations
Flub.Description: The number of noise iterations performed on the terrain.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
